item.description: Stereokinetic Effect # p5-instance-div markdown const frame_rate = 60; function setup() { createCanvas(500, 500); frameRate(frame_rate); } function draw() { background(220); let difference = 40; let inner_diameter = 40; const outer_circles = 11; const start = inner_diameter + outer_circles * difference; const end = inner_diameter; noStroke(); let posX = 0, posY = 0; let referenceX = width / 2; let referenceY = height / 2; for (let diameter = start, index = 0; diameter >= end; diameter -= difference, index++) { fill(index % 2 === 0 ?
